overview: There's bedlam in the bedroom with Falcon Exclusives Tom Chase and Mike Branson. Catch these two wildcats in a hot and rugged, eye-popping sex scene! See Tom as you've never seen him before! Did someone say, "Bottoms Up?" This tale of "A Day in the Life of a Mattress" tells it all! Also starring Falcon Exclusives Jeremy and Eric Hanson; and featuring Matthew Anders. Plus Marc Stewart,Brian Daniels, Dale Rhodes, Troy Rider, Dean Edwards, and Allen Ames.
title: California Kings
